meanings.definition: The genetic constitution of an individual organism.
meanings.sent1: My genotype determines what traits I inherit from my parents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the genotype of different species to understand their genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my genotype includes the ability to taste bitter foods more intensely.
meanings.sent4: The genotype of the rare flower revealed its unique color patterns.
meanings.sent5: Understanding your genotype can help predict potential health risks.

meanings.definition: The combination of alleles for a particular trait that an organism possesses.
meanings.sent1: The genotype of the flower determined its color and size.
meanings.sent2: Each person has a unique genotype that influences their physical characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The genotype of the fruit fly made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her genotype was like a secret code that unlocked her genetic traits.
meanings.sent5: The breeder selected plants based on their genotype for better crop yield.
